1#ifndef MIDSIDE_H
2#define MIDSIDE_H
3
4#include <cmath>
5
6namespace bdsp
7{
8
9 struct MidSideScalingFactor
10 {
11 static constexpr double CORRELATED = 2.0;
12 static constexpr double UNCORRELATED = 1.4142135623730950488016887242096980785696718753769480731766797379;
13 };
14
15 template <typename FloatType>
16 class MidSide
17 {
18 public:
19 MidSide() = delete;
20 MidSide(const MidSide &) = delete;
21 MidSide &operator=(const MidSide &) = delete;
22 ~MidSide() = delete;
23
24 static inline void
25 encode_custom(FloatType scaling_factor,
26 FloatType left,
27 FloatType right,
28 FloatType &mid,
29 FloatType &side)
30 {
31 mid = (left + right) / scaling_factor;
32 side = (left - right) / scaling_factor;
33 }
34
35 static inline void encode_correlated(FloatType left, FloatType right, FloatType &mid, FloatType &side)
36 {
37 encode_custom((FloatType)MidSideScalingFactor::CORRELATED, left, right, mid, side);
38 }
39
40 static inline void encode_uncorrelated(FloatType left, FloatType right, FloatType &mid, FloatType &side)
41 {
42 encode_custom((FloatType)MidSideScalingFactor::UNCORRELATED, left, right, mid, side);
43 }
44
45 static inline void decode_custom(FloatType scaling_factor,
46 FloatType &left,
47 FloatType &right,
48 FloatType mid,
49 FloatType side)
50 {
51 left = (mid + side) / scaling_factor;
52 right = (mid - side) / scaling_factor;
53 }
54
55 static inline void decode_correlated(FloatType &left, FloatType &right, FloatType mid, FloatType side)
56 {
57 decode_custom((FloatType)MidSideScalingFactor::CORRELATED, left, right, mid, side);
58 }
59
60 static inline void decode_uncorrelated(FloatType &left, FloatType &right, FloatType mid, FloatType side)
61 {
62 decode_custom((FloatType)MidSideScalingFactor::UNCORRELATED, left, right, mid, side);
63 }
64 };
65
66} // namespace BDSP

68#endif // MIDSIDE_H
